column1: identified. Sisira De Abrew, J who took into account, the fact that the evidence of the son
of the Plaintiff was not cross examined by the Defendant had the following to say in that
“The son of the Plaintiff-Respondent gave evidence and also produced the permit
marked P1 which describes the land by reference to physical metes and bounds. His
evidence was not challenged by the Defendant-Appellant. The son of the Plaintiff-
Respondent was not cross-examined by the Defendant-Appellant. This shows that
the Defendant-Appellant has admitted the boundaries of the land of the Plaintiff-
